name: Gravity Grappler Classic
description:
Wield the powers of gravity and black holes to collect stars and avoid asteroids in this 2d physics game! 

Use arrow keys to change the gravity affecting your ship and asteroids.

Hold space bar to activate black holes near you to pull your space ship in.

Made during the HackEd 2020 hackathon, and winner of the Organizer's Choice Award.

Credits:

Natalie Bombardieri

Jared Schroeder
